_sText: nyro's SDK Steam Group - SURF\_LT\_OMNIFIC - 08-07-12 NOTE TO SERVER OWNERS: ====================== This map features secret trails, which are parented to grenades. If your server removes these then you won't be able to acquire them. point_servercommand - sv_enablebunnyhopping 1 - sv_airaccelerate 150 - mp_limitteams 0 - sv_maxvelocity 10000 FPS ISSUES? =========== Try r_3dsky 0 if you have fps issues. This disables the 3d skybox and will free up some resources. If you're running in windowed mode, try switching to fullscreen as well. This map has A LOT of custom content(specifically the amount of model files), I optimized it the best I could. Unfortunately some players will have fps problems while others will remain unaffected. Description: - 18 stages increasing in difficulty as you progress. - 3 additional bonus stages. - All surf ramps were made out of models. - Designed for 66 tick. Lead Mapper: nyro (Contact/Paypal: nyronic@gmail.com) - Spawn - Ending - Optimization - Stages: 1, 5, 9, 12, 15, 16, Bonus 3 Mapper: qr - Stages: 3, 6, 8, 10, 13, 18, Bonus 2 Mapper: checkem - Stages: 2, 4, 7, 11, 14, 17, Bonus 1 Main Testers: - dillinger - explizit - hlstriker - joseph - luckycharms - rambjoe - showtime - skyline Additional Testers: - anonymous - agoraphobic nosebleed - bella - brian - demon - dharkk - evolv - fasterkatt - foot fetish joe - habitat - morning - nolf - prad bitt - ronjon - seeker - untouch - yoshiii - zeppelin - zombieslayer - Everyone who played _a18 - Anyone I missed! Music: - Mono/Poly - Land of Love/Star Grab - M83 - Black Hole Special Thanks: - cfoust: Author of Propper - Chris528: Author of the dev texture pack Compile Stats: - brushes: 99.5% - brushsides: 92.7% - waterindices: 47.8% -
